item.title: Build a Swarm cluster
item.description: The version 1.12 of Docker has been released few days ago. Among the changes, Docker-Swarm get embedded directly into the Engine that allow easier Swarm deployment. I’m going to show that to you. Docker Swarm is native clustering for Docker. It turns a pool of Docker hosts into a single, virtual Docker host. Earlier stages, it was quite hard to deploy a Swarm cluster, you had to generate some certs, use a service discovery, configure each node… This time is over !
